TopicTitle: A list of Agencies available in the game.

Articles.Content:
Is there a way to see a list of the available Agencies that can be assigned to missions?

I have various mods installed. Some have agents configured that can be displayed on the missions list.

(i.e. XXX Company needs this mission accomplished.)

But recently I had a mission from a company (agent) with a flag and description, but no name displayed.

Through scanning my mods, I found the flag, (From OKRAM folder) and I think its because in its Agent cfg file they left out the line: "title = Okram Industries"

 

So I wondered if there is an easier way to see a list of all Agents in my game. Scanning the GameData folder for "agent.cfg" will find some, but not all. For example OKRAM's agent cfg file was called Okram.cfg.

1 hour ago, Gargamel said:

Moved to add-on Discussion. 

Well maybe not technical an add-on discussion. Wanted to know if you can see a list of agencies in game somewhere.

Did a text search on the MMconfigCache and was able to find the info I need that way.

Thanks.
